articles.title: If You Buy Apple With $10,000 in 2025, Will You Become a Millionaire in 10 Years?
articles.content: Apple's ability to introduce inventive products and easy-to-use software has created a loyal following among consumers across the globe.  Worries about tariffs and slow progress with artificial intelligence (AI) might be the key factors on the minds of investors these days.  If you buy Apple shares today with $10,000, will that starting sum turn into $1 million by 2035?

articles.title: MP Materials (MP) Soars 40% on Multi-Billio Dollar Deals
articles.content: We recently published 10 Stocks With Unbelievable Gains This Week. MP Materials Corp. (NYSE:MP) is one of this week’s biggest players. articles.title: JPMorgan Bumps Apple (AAPL) PT to $250, Keeps ‘Overweight’
articles.content: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. articles.title: Trump's antitrust cops are OK with new mergers. Old tech monopolies, not so much.
articles.content: President Trump's antitrust cops are so far friendlier about mergers than their predecessors, but they are refusing to let up on one prominent priority of the Biden administration: monopoly prosecutions of the nation's best-known tech giants.

articles.title: Could Arm Holdings Stock Help You Become a Millionaire?
articles.content: Arm's market capitalization has already reached $160 billion, indicating significant growth in the stock.  Arm Holdings (NASDAQ: ARM) has long stood out in the semiconductor industry, particularly regarding its mobile phone processors.  Amid those gains, investors may wonder whether the stock will mint millionaires, or do its past gains make such a scenario unlikely?

articles.title: Forget About Share Buybacks and Dividends: Here Is How Apple Can Win Growth Investors Back
articles.content: Investors are looking for growth opportunities beyond share buybacks and dividend payments from Apple.

articles.title: Will Nvidia Reach a $5 Trillion Market Cap in 2025?
articles.content: Nvidia recently reached the milestone of $4 trillion in market value -- something no other company has ever done.  The stock has soared thanks to Nvidia’s strength in the artificial intelligence market.  Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) has already reached a couple of huge milestones this year.

articles.title: Warren Buffett Sold Apple and Bank of America in Favor of This Boring Investment Offering a 4.3% Yield
articles.content: Buffett continues to favor this stable source of revenue for Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio.

articles.title: 1 Unstoppable Stock Has Quietly Outperformed Every Single Member of the "Magnificent Seven," and It's Still a Buy Right Now, According to Wall Street.
articles.content: The "Magnificent Seven" stocks have been the flag bearers of artificial intelligence (AI), but face headwinds.  Netflix stock is up 94% over the past year, and the evidence suggests there's more to come.
